name: FX 15-Min Double-Top/Bottom Volume Breakout
description: Technical pattern strategy for major forex pairs on 15-minute bars. Detects classic double bottom (long) and double top (short) formations, requires neckline breakout accompanied by tick-volume that is ≥125 % of the 10-bar average. Risk is controlled via fixed-fraction sizing at 1.5 % equity per trade, ATR-based stop approximates ≤0.8× pattern height, and take-profit seeks ≈1.8× pattern height advance. No pyramiding; position exits early on close back across the neckline.
